long_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 30B compass stirs the pot on compass design with innovations such as tool-free declination and circle-over-circle alignment. Its clean design is straightforward and user-friendly. Orbital navigation helps eliminate confusion by using a single color and reducing parallax. Tool-free declination adjustment allows easy reading and convenient navigating. Transparent baseplate makes it easy to navigate with a map. The Brunton O.S.S. 30B compass features an extra-long straight edge, 2deg resolution, a lanyard and scales in both inches and millimeters.
short_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 30B compass stirs the pot on compass design with innovations such as tool-free declination and circle-over-circle alignment. Its clean design is straightforward and user-friendly.
